types.html:
conscience professionnelle f (uncountable)

  1. conscientiousness; work ethic (characteristic of being conscientious, of being thorough, careful, and vigilant in the performance of one’s task, in carrying out one's duties; value according to which one ought to work hard at one's job or duties)

See also

[edit]
  • professionnalisme
  • éthique de travail

title: conscience professionnelle
pronunHtml: • IPA(key): /kɔ̃.sjɑ̃s pʁɔ.fɛ.sjɔ.nɛl/
